group_1.textRight: See you Rena, Momoko!
Yup, see you tomorrow!
All right, shall we follow suit, then?

group_1.textLeft: Momoko, what's up with you today?

group_1.textRight: Hmm?

group_1.textLeft: The second I asked you what you were@doing on Valentine's Day...

group_1.textRight: Oh, did I? Was I acting that weird?

group_1.textLeft: Yeah...you got this dark look on your@face...

group_1.textRight: Ah, sorry 'bout that! Listen, it's no @big deal!
It's just... Before, I got shot down by my@crush before I could even ask him.
I think I told you about it already.
Seriously, though, I'm totally over it now!
But even though it's all in the past...
When Valentine's Day rolls around, I just @can't help thinkin'...
"Those two are probably together right @now..."
I guess it brings all the old feelings back.
That's why I was actin' a little weird.
And don't forget, I'm Bad Timing Momoko.
I might bump into 'em when he's tryin'@to give her chocolate.
Hahaha!

group_1.textLeft: Yeah, I can totally imagine that for you.

group_1.textRight: Whaaat?!
You're supposed to say, "Don't worry,@Momoko, that'll never happen!"

group_1.textLeft: [chara:100901:effect_emotion_joy_0][se:7222_happy]Pfft...ha ha ha ha! Your face! ...Ah ha ha!

group_1.textRight: Ergh! Quit laughin' already!

group_1.narration: I really am over all that.
But when I think about it...@My heart aches way too much.
I thought all the scars from that time had@healed already, but I guess not...

group_1.textLeft: Hey, Mika, did you hear? Everyone's@talking about it!

group_1.textRight: Oh, you mean THAT? Yeah, I did!

group_1.textCenter: The rumor about the Valentine's Monster!
